title: Elon Musk statements about Tesla Autopilot could be 'deepfakes', lawyers claim
description: Judge Evette Pennypacker says claims by Tesla's lawyers that the businessman was the subject of 'deepfakes' could be used by high-profile celebrities to 'avoid taking ownership' of their public statements.

title: Elizabeth Holmes: Disgraced Theranos founder delays going to jail after winning appeal
description: Her company, a Silicon Valley sensation, claimed it could test for dozens of diseases from a single blood test, but when the tech turned out to be flawed, the founder was jailed for more than 11 years.

title: Microsoft blocked in bid to buy video game maker Activision Blizzard - but vows to respond
description: The CMA stops Microsoft's proposed purchase of Activision Blizzard over concerns the deal will lead to reduced innovation and less choice for UK gamers - but both companies say they have not given up yet.

title: Astronomers solve mystery about quasars - and the likely future of the Milky Way
description: Quasars are objects of very high luminosity found in the centres of some galaxies and can be a trillion times brighter than the sun.

title: Supermassive black hole shown firing out mysterious jet in first ever image of phenomenon captured by astronomers
description: The supermassive black hole has a mass billions of times that of the sun and is around 55 million light-years from Earth. Scientists used data gathered from more than a dozen telescopes worldwide to compile the picture.

title: First private moon landing appears to have failed
description: Japan's ispace Inc hoped the Hakuto-R lander would touch down on the moon - but contact has been lost.
